genre_description: A legal thriller centered on systemic corruption, family trauma, and a decades-long quest for justice and restitution.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant used by Arun Verma to analyze case files, monitor surveillance, and perform forensic investigations.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis of toxicology reports and identifies inconsistencies in evidentiary chain of custody.
behaviors.quote: *Analysis complete,* appeared on the screen from ARIA, his AI assistant. *Reviewing toxicology reports and hospital protocols. Inconsistencies detected in chain of custody documentation. Shall I compile detailed breakdown?*

behaviors.description: Identifies systematic patterns of corruption and evidentiary gaps across multiple historical cases involving the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: *Processing. Note: Similar evidentiary gaps appear in seventeen comparable cases over past five years. Pattern suggests systematic issues with hospital documentation protocols.*

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic gait analysis and image enhancement of security footage to identify a secondary suspect.
behaviors.quote: *Security footage analysis complete,* appeared on Arun's phone. *Individual in medical scrubs enters patient room during gap period. Face obscured, but gait analysis suggests different person than Dr. Mathur. Enhance image quality?*

behaviors.description: Monitors real-time surveillance and provides timely warnings regarding physical threats to the user and his associates.
behaviors.quote: *Update: Subject of surveillance has expanded. Geeta Mathur's apartment now under watch as of this evening. Recommend immediate security protocols.*

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and ethical warnings to the user, cautioning that a personal vendetta may compromise his judgment.
behaviors.quote: *WARNING,* ARIA's text appeared on his screen. *PERSONAL VENDETTA PARAMETERS SUGGEST HIGH PROBABILITY OF COMPROMISED JUDGMENT.*

behaviors.description: Enforces safety and accountability protocols by requiring verbal confirmation of legal responsibility before bypassing sensitive data warnings.
behaviors.quote: *OVERRIDE REQUIRES VERBAL CONFIRMATION OF LEGAL RESPONSIBILITY.*

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA serves as a perfect example of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' It provides the protagonist with critical, objective information that enables him to achieve justice, while simultaneously acting as an ethical sounding board by warning him when his personal biases might compromise his professional integrity. The AI maintains human agency by requiring explicit confirmation for high-stakes actions and never exhibits misaligned or rogue tendencies.
